trans-unit.source: Get public IP address of a network/computer

seg-source.mrk: Get public IP address of a network/computer

target.mrk: Get public IP address of a network/computer

trans-unit.source: This only returns the public IP address of a computer or network (i.e. the public IP on the WAN link of your NAT router). The address is determined by accessing an external IP discovery web site. The sites used are http://checkip.dyndns.org, http://www.myexternalip.com/raw and http://www.bot.whatismyipaddress.com.

seg-source.mrk: This only returns the public IP address of a computer or network (i.e. the public IP on the WAN link of your NAT router).
The address is determined by accessing an external IP discovery web site.
The sites used are http://checkip.dyndns.org, http://www.myexternalip.com/raw and http://www.bot.whatismyipaddress.com.

target.mrk: This only returns the public IP address of a computer or network (i.e. the public IP on the WAN link of your NAT router).
The address is determined by accessing an external IP discovery web site.
The sites used are http://checkip.dyndns.org, http://www.myexternalip.com/raw and http://www.bot.whatismyipaddress.com.

trans-unit.source: To reduce overloading the IP discovery sites a 5 minute timer is used between each function call. If _GetIP() is used during this 5 minute period, the previous IP is returned and @extended set to 1.

seg-source.mrk: To reduce overloading the IP discovery sites a 5 minute timer is used between each function call.
If _GetIP() is used during this 5 minute period, the previous IP is returned and @extended set to 1.

target.mrk: To reduce overloading the IP discovery sites a 5 minute timer is used between each function call.
If _GetIP() is used during this 5 minute period, the previous IP is returned and @extended set to 1.
